name: Blockade (itch) (JordonRoss, Hawaiian_Noises)
description:
Blockade is a game about thinking one step ahead. Try to crush your opponent before they crush you. Or play single player and see how long you can survive above a pit of lava by building a constantly crumbling tower of bricks.

1 Player Controls:
- Arrow keys : Move and jump
- Tap Left | Right : Move block dropper

2 Player Controls:
- W, A, S : Move and Jump
- Tap A | D : Move block dropper

Credits:
- Game design / Art: Jordon Ross
- Programming: Lorne Hawke
- Art / Character animation: Yvearna Bailey
